title: Taliyah Auto Animation Shoots Sideways (Again)

embed.description: Freljord Taliyah auto animation shoots at an angle and kinda throws me off.

body: This exact same bug has reappeared in summoners rift as of patch 7.20! All of Taliyah's auto attacks, both on her default skin and Freljord skin are shooting sideways and its quite the inconvenience. Can this bug be revisited like the last time? {{champion:163}}

replies.body:
Hey! 

This was fixed a couple patches ago, but *somehow* came back. >_> One of our QA folks from Champion is looking into it! Thanks for the report!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=4AOE9xEK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-19T19:59:56.437+0000)
>
> Hey! 
> 
> This was fixed a couple patches ago, but *somehow* came back. >_> One of our QA folks from Champion is looking into it! Thanks for the report!

Thank you so much!!

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}} 

Looks like this'll be fixed up soon - fix is currently on PBE, and will be in next patch. <3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=4AOE9xEK,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-10-27T19:21:16.383+0000)
>
> {{sticker:sg-ezreal}} 
> 
> Looks like this'll be fixed up soon - fix is currently on PBE, and will be in next patch. <3

{{sticker:sg-lux}} 

You're a star! I can finally CS properly :D
It's actually funny to look at, but yeah it's a bug, hope they fix it.
